newsitem.title: USA: Linkon Corp sees '97 revs at $4.4 mln.
newsitem.headline: Linkon Corp sees '97 revs at $4.4 mln.

text.p: Linkon Corp said Tuesday that it anticipates reporting revenues of $4.4 million for the fiscal year ended January 31, an increase of over 214 percent versus the prior year's revenues of $1.4 million.
The company said it expects to continue to grow as its research and development projects come to market, its strategic relationships mature and marketing efforts in the Pacific Rim produce results.
Linkon develops, manufactures and markets digital signal processor based communication hardware and software for the compute, telephone and Internet industries.
